data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Bayanhongor, Mongolia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bayanhongor, Mongolia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Bayanhongor.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 31,000 people living in the state of Bayanhongor.
Father, convict the 268 believers in Bayanhongor to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Mongol, Khamnigan people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Pour your Spirit out on the 31,000 citizens of Bayanhongor, Mongolia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Bayanhongor, Mongolia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bayanhongor, Mongolia has a population of 31,000.

We estimate Bayanhongor has 268 people who might know Jesus, 279 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 30,454 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 115 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Bayanhongor to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
